{{Disambig}}

'''Map''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
*{{ItemLink|Map}} – an item which provides an overview of the surrounding terrain
*{{ItemLink|id=ocean-explorer-map|Explorer Map}} – a map that locates a monument, woodland mansion, trial chamber, village, swamp hut, jungle temple, or buried treasure, depending on the type
* The [[Overworld]] – the main area (i.e. map) of the game
*The [[World]] – the entire area (i.e. map) of the game, including all of its [[Dimension|dimensions]]
*[[Obfuscation map]] – {{w|ProGuard}} mappings from old (original) names to new (obfuscated) names for classes and class members that have been renamed.
*[[Map item format]]

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
*{{MCD|Mission Select}} – visually a table top map, which allows the player to choose a {{MCD|mission}} to play.
*{{MCD|Icon Map}} – an {{MCD|unused}} {{MCD|item}} that was scrapped during the development of the {{MCD|Echoing Void}}.

== ''Minecraft Earth'' ==
*[[Earth:Map|Map]] – the game's real-world map using the players GPS coordinates

== ''Minecraft Legends'' ==
*[[Legends:Map|Map]] – a tool which displays the world
